snippet.title: The Stand | Official Trailer | Paramount+
snippet.description:
The Stand is Stephen King’s apocalyptic vision of a world decimated by plague and embroiled in an elemental struggle between good and evil. The fate of mankind rests on the frail shoulders of the 108-year-old Mother Abagail (Whoopi Goldberg) and a handful of survivors. Their worst nightmares are embodied in a man with a lethal smile and unspeakable powers: Randall Flagg (Alexander Skarsgård), the Dark Man. This limited-event series also closes with a new coda written by the famed author himself. Stream full episodes of The Stand exclusively on CBS All Access.

CBS All Access is becoming Paramount+ on March 4, 2021. Subscribe now! http://bit.ly/2M86oXM

Learn more about "Paramount+" HERE: http://bit.ly/3iABWBV
Subscribe To "Paramount+" Channel HERE: https://www.youtube.com/ParamountPlus
Like "Paramount+" on Facebook HERE: https://www.facebook.com/ParamountPlus/
Follow "Paramount+" on Twitter HERE: https://twitter.com/ParamountPlus
Follow "Paramount+" on Instagram HERE: https://www.instagram.com/ParamountPlus/

Get the CBS app for iPhone & iPad! Click HERE: https://cbs.app.link/5WL3iKUD52
Get the CBS app for Android phone & tablet. Click HERE: https://cbs.app.link/5WL3iKUD52

—

CBS All Access is becoming Paramount+ on March 4, 2021.

Paramount+ will include tens of thousands of episodes from CBS, BET, Comedy Central, MTV, Nickelodeon, Paramount Pictures, Smithsonian Channel, and more. 

Don’t miss out on the Paramount+ Originals collection—including exclusive shows and movies you’ll only catch here—like Kamp Koral: SpongeBob’s Under Years and returning seasons of Why Women Kill, The Good Fight, and Star Trek: Picard.

Plus, you can count on Paramount+ for hundreds of movies, plus the latest in live sports and news with your local CBS station, CBSN, CBS Sports HQ, and ET Live. 

There’s something for every mood and every family member on Paramount+. 

Sign up now (http://bit.ly/2M86oXM) and enjoy your favorite live sports, news, and hit shows. Then, stream even more hit series, movies, and originals when CBS All Access becomes Paramount+ on March 4, 2021.
